{{/html}} #end {{/velocity}} {{velocity}} \\ \\ #set($Integer = 0) #set($tipExamen = "licență") #set($numeDecan = "Conf. univ. dr. Adrian Iftene") #set($nrCrt = 1) (% class="titlu" style="text-transform: uppercase;text-align:center" %)(((== REZULTATE FINALE LA EXAMENUL DE $tipExamen== \\ ))) #set($probe = []) #set($note = {}) #foreach($user in $xwiki.rightsmanager.usersApi.allUsersNames) #getNotaPage($user) #foreach($nota in $notaPage.getObjects($notaClass)) #if(!$note.containsKey($nota.student)) #set($note[$nota.student] = []) #end #set($discard = $note[$nota.student].add($nota)) #if(!$probe.contains($nota.proba)) #set($discard = $probe.add($nota.proba)) #end #end #end #set($discard = $probe.sort()) (% class="myClass" style="border-collapse:collapse;background-color:white" %)((( (%style="font-size:12px;font-style: italic;border: 1px solid black;border-collapse: collapse"%) |=(%style="width:20px;text-align:center;border: 1px solid black;background-color:white"%)Nr. crt.|=(%style="width:190px;text-align:center;border: 1px solid black;vertical-align: middle;background-color:white"%)Numele și prenumele#foreach($proba in $probe)|=(%style="width:50px;text-align:center;border: 1px solid black;background-color:white"%)Media la $proba#end|=(%style="width:70px;text-align:center;border: 1px solid black;background-color:white"%)Media finală a ex de $tipExamen|=(%style="width:70px;text-align:center;border: 1px solid black;vertical-align: middle;background-color:white"%)Observatii (%style="font-size:12px;font-style: normal;border: 1px solid black;border-collapse: collapse"%) #foreach($pair in $note.entrySet()) #set($numNote = {}) #set($sumNote = {}) #foreach($nota in $pair.value) #if(!$numNote.containsKey($nota.proba)) #set($numNote[$nota.proba] = 0) #set($sumNote[$nota.proba] = 0) #end #set($numNote[$nota.proba] = $numNote[$nota.proba] + 1) #set($sumNote[$nota.proba] = $sumNote[$nota.proba] + $Integer.parseInt($nota.nota, 10)) #end ## #set($medii = {}) #set($minMedie = 1000) #set($sumMedii = 0) #foreach($proba in $numNote.entrySet()) #set($medie = $sumNote[$proba.key] * 100 / $proba.value) #if($medie < $minMedie) #set($minMedie = $medie) #end #set($sumMedii = $sumMedii + $medie) #set($medii[$proba.key] = $numbertool.format("#0,00", $medie)) #end ## #if($minMedie >= 500 && $medii.size() == $probe.size()) #set($observatii = "promovat") #set($sumMedii = $sumMedii / $medii.size()) #set($medieFin = $numbertool.format("#0,00", $sumMedii)) #else #set($observatii = "nepromovat") #set($medieFin = "-") #end ## |(%style="width:20px;text-align:center;border-bottom:1px;border: 1px solid black"%)$nrCrt|(%style="width:190px;text-align:left;border: 1px solid black;text-transform: uppercase"%)$pair.key#foreach($proba in $probe)|(%style="width:50px;text-align:center;border: 1px solid black"%)$medii.getOrDefault($proba, "-")#end|(%style="width:70px;text-align:center;border: 1px solid black"%)$medieFin|(%style="width:70px;text-align:center;border: 1px solid black"%)$observatii #set($nrCrt = $nrCrt + 1) #end ))) Afișat $datetool.get('dd.MM.yyyy'), ora $datetool.get('H') // (% class="myClass" style="font-weight: bold;font-size:12px;text-align:center" %)((( // ==== DECAN,==== ==== $numeDecan==== ))) {{/velocity}}
